org.pojava.datetime
Class DateTimeConfig

java.lang.Object
  org.pojava.datetime.DateTimeConfig
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable, IDateTimeConfig
public class DateTimeConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDateTimeConfig, java.io.Serializable

Establish global defaults for shaping DateTime behavior. This version supports English, German, French and Spanish month names in the date parser, and can be customized by your applications to interpret other languages.

Author:
John Pile
See Also:
Serialized Form

Field Detail

LANGUAGE_MONTHS

public static final java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String[]> LANGUAGE_MONTHS
LANGUAGE_MONTHS maps a language to a string array of 12 calendar month prefixes.

SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES

public static final java.util.List<java.lang.String> SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES
SUPPORTED_LANGUAGES determines the order and selection in which different languages are checked against calendar names. You can increase performance of the parser by ordering or removing entries.

Constructor Detail

DateTimeConfig

public DateTimeConfig()
Method Detail

isDmyOrder

public boolean isDmyOrder()
Returns true if 01/02/1970 is interpreted as 1970-02-01, returns false if 01/02/1970 is interpreted as 1970-01-02.

Specified by:
isDmyOrder in interface IDateTimeConfig
Returns:
True if DD/MM/YYYY is recognized by parser over MM/DD/YYYY.

setDmyOrder

public void setDmyOrder(boolean isDmyOrder)
Set true if parser should interpret dates as DD/MM/YYYY instead of MM/DD/YYYY.

Parameters:
isDmyOrder -

getTzMap

public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.String> getTzMap()
Description copied from interface: IDateTimeConfig
Map of timezones and their offsets. You can customize the default map to add your own timezones by referencing other timezones.

Specified by:
getTzMap in interface IDateTimeConfig
Returns:
a Map of time zones recognized by DateTime.

getEpochDOW

public int getEpochDOW()
Get the day of week offset on the epoch date. This is used to calculate the day of week for all other dates.

Returns:
